content: We build modern, blazing-fast web applications. Integrated ImageKit.io for optimized image storage and CDN delivery, TanStack Query for efficient data fetching, caching, and infinite scroll for seamless UX, Designed responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and lazy loading for cross-device accessibility

MERN full stack application having features like Add/Edit/Delete transactions, transaction list view, Monthly expenses bar chart, Category-wise pie chart. Dashboard with summary cards: total expenses, category breakdown, most recent transactions
Built a fully responsive e-commerce web app using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Redux, featuring cart functionality and Stripe integration for payment processing.
Designed a multi-user grocery shopping platform with Python, Flask, Vue.js, and Redis, supporting features like product search, cart management, and batch job processing with Celery

We are building a browser-based video editing tool. Features includes Upload custom video, Rearrage audio and styled images, preview the edited video in real time, Export and download the final version
Bringing story to life. Building a AI powered stories web platfrom where user can generate a story book which contains images and the content
